bug.description:
Transferred from <denchmark-link:http://code.opencv.org/issues/4496>http://code.opencv.org/issues/4496</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>|| Alexander Stohr on 2015-07-22 08:30 || Priority: Normal || Affected: branch 'master' (3.0-dev) || Category: objdetect || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: Easy || PR: || Platform: Any / Any </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>cameraman.jpg</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>i feel like that file is used by some tests but it is missing from the opencv_extra repository (and it's not part of any other repo i cloned).
my best guess for that image is the one (512x512) on that web page: http://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/answers/90428-colormap-problem-i-try-one-colorful-image-and-two-black-white-it-works-with-one-of-the-black-whit
it should be present in a fashion of line_descriptor/cameraman.jpg in order to make the opencv_test_line_descriptor binary pass. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>History</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: This issue no longer persists. The file is present under line_descriptor.Please mark the issue closed.
